name: Fast Cart - Smart Billing Interface
desc: Developed a Flutter app that saves time by self-billing goods. It integrates UPI services to provide quick payments and reduces the need for human intervention, hence increasing shopping efficiency.

name: Events Hub
desc: A single, central website that lists all of the upcoming hackathons and cultural events being held by various colleges, builds connections between them, and aids in campus promotion.

name: PermitEase - Streamlined College Permissions
desc: An app that streamlines permission management in colleges or offices, enabling users to submit, track, and manage requests digitally, while providing higher-ups with intuitive tools for efficient review and response.

name: Project 4
desc: Description for Project 4. This project showcases advanced features and innovative solutions.

name: Project 5
desc: Description for Project 5. This project focuses on user-friendly design and efficient functionality.
